00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::ScoringDownload;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021  
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::ScoringDownload - Download scoring data files
00023 
00024 =cut
00025 
00026 use strict;
00027 use warnings;
00028 
00029 sub pre_header_initialize {
00030     my ($self) = @_;
00031     my $r          = $self->r;
00032     my $ce         = $r->ce;
00033     my $authz      = $r->authz;
00034     my $scoringDir = $ce->{courseDirs}->{scoring};
00035     my $file       = $r->param('getFile');
00036     my $user       = $r->param('user');
00037     
00038     if ($authz->hasPermissions($user, "score_sets")) {
00039         $self->reply_with_file("text/comma-separated-values", "$scoringDir/$file", $file, 0); # 0==don't delete file after downloading
00040     } else {
00041         $self->addbadmessage("You do not have permission to access scoring data.");
00042     }
00043 }
00044 
00045 1;
00046 
00047 __END__
00048 
00049 # FIXME replace all crap with a call to reply_with_file
00050 # FIXME and then maybe merge that functionality into Scoring.pm
00051 sub header {
00052     my ($self)     = @_;
00053     my $r          = $self->r;
00054     my $ce         = $r->ce;
00055     my $scoringDir = $ce->{courseDirs}->{scoring};
00056     my $file       = $r->param('getFile');
00057     if (-f "$scoringDir/$file") {
00058         $r->content_type('text/comma-separated-values');
00059         $r->header_out("Content-Disposition" => "attachment; filename=$file;");
00060         $r->send_http_header();
00061         return OK;
00062     } else {
00063         $self->{noContent} = 1;
00064         return NOT_FOUND;
00065     }
00066 }
00067 
00068 sub content {
00069     my ($self)     = @_;
00070     my $r          = $self->r;
00071     my $ce         = $r->ce;
00072     my $authz      = $r->authz;
00073     my $scoringDir = $ce->{courseDirs}->{scoring};
00074     my $user       = $r->param('user');
00075     
00076     if (!$authz->hasPermissions($user, "score_sets")) {
00077         print "You do not have permission to access scoring data";
00078     } else {
00079         my $file = $r->param('getFile');
00080         open my $fh, "<", "$scoringDir/$file";
00081         print while (<$fh>);
00082         close $fh;
00083     }
00084 }
00085 
00086 1;
